source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_SEQ_00<tab>Gerbert longs for the days when statues of Rhalgr dotted the Peaks.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_SEQ_00<tab>アラガーナのゲルベルトは、壊神ラールガー像の状態が気になるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_TODO_00<tab>Examine the statues at the designated locations.
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_000<tab>Ah, good to see you again. Pleased to say those rats have not bothered me since you scared them off.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_000ああ、アンタか。
この前は、ネズミ退治をありがとう。
おかげで、息子の墓参りに行けるようになったよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_001<tab>In fact, could I ask for your help once more?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_001ところで、信頼できるアンタに頼みたいことがあるんだが……
すまんが、聞いてくれんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_002<tab>The Peaks used to be filled with more Rhalgr statues than you could shake a stick at. Of course, the Empire did not approve of this and ordered them all to be destroyed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_002かつて山岳地帯には、壊神ラールガー像がいくつもあったんだ。
だが、20年前に侵攻してきた帝国軍は、壊神信仰を弾圧し、
そのすべてを破壊するように命じてな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_003<tab>Though as luck would have it, I have heard two survived. The only issue is the bridges that used to lead to them have fallen into disrepair. Hence why I have been unable to check them myself. Please search for them in my place.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_003運よく、2体の像は破壊を逃れたという噂もあるが、
そこに至る陸橋も崩され、長らく状態が確認できずにいる。
どうか、俺の代わりに確認してきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_004<tab>I have marked both their locations on your map. Good luck!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_004地図に「壊神ラールガー像」があるはずの場所に印をつけた。
どちらも高所で、たどりつくには工夫が必要だろうが、
よろしく頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_005<tab>I have marked the locations of both Rhalgr statues on your map. Good luck!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_005地図に「壊神ラールガー像」があるはずの場所に印をつけた。
どちらも高所で、たどりつくには工夫が必要だろうが、
よろしく頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The statue is missing two key components: an arm and its head.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>壊神ラールガー像は、酷く損傷している……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>This statue has also seen better days.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>壊神ラールガー像は、無残な姿をさらしている……。
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_040<tab>壊神ラールガー像の様子は、どうだった？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_041<tab>Oh, that is truly a shame. I suppose it was foolish of me to get my hopes up.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_041嗚呼、なんてことだ……。
希望だった2体までも、無残な姿になりはてていたとは……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_042<tab>The monks belonging to the Fist of Rhalgr and the religion's followers used to go on pilgrimages often to compare the different statues.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_042かつては、星導教の信徒や修行僧たちが、
各地に立つ異なる表情の壊神ラールガー像を巡り、
心身を鍛えていたというのに……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_043<tab>No matter how long it takes, I will make sure the statues are reconstructed. I will not stand back and watch as this tradition dies.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_043どんなに時間がかかろうとも、
みんなで力を合わせて、再建していかなければ……。
そうすれば、また昔のような光景が戻ってくるだろうから。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_044<tab>My thanks for taking on such a difficult task. Here, take this as your payment.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ918_02874_GERBERT_000_044難儀な頼みごとをかなえてくれて、ありがとう。
アンタには、本当に世話になった。
礼として、これを受け取ってくれ。
